title: Natural Language Intermediate Representation
description: Schema for the intermediate representation of a natural language claim before it is translated into a formal language.

statement_id.description: A unique identifier for the NL statement.

source_nl.description: The original, unmodified natural language text.

logical_form.description: The structured logical representation of the source text.

grounding_context.description: Mapping of entities and concepts from the logical form to the system's ontology.

confidence_score.description: The confidence score from the NL processor (0.0 to 1.0).

disambiguation_notes.description: Notes on any ambiguities that were resolved or remain.
